SQL_STMT_U.val: select d.DocEntry, d.LineNum, H.DocNum, h.ObjType, h.BPLId, h.DocStatus, d.LineStatus, h.Requester, h.ReqName, p.Name as DeptName, h.DocDate, d.PQTReqDate as RequiredDate, d.LineVendor, c.CardName, h.ProjectHeader as Project, isnull(d.Project,'') as Activity, d.OpenQty as Quantity, (d.OpenQty * d.Price) as LineTotal, h.DocCur, h.Comments, d.ItemCode, d.Dscription as ItemName from prq1 d join ( select IIF(Project IS NULL OR Project = '', ':12', Project) as ProjectHeader, * from oprq h1 ) h on d.docentry = h.docentry left join OUDP p on h.Department = p.code left join ocrd c on d.LineVendor = c.CardCode where h.DocStatus = 'O' and d.LineStatus = 'O' and h.CANCELED <> 'Y' and h.DocNum like '%:1%' and h.DocType = :2 and h.ReqName like '%:4%' and d.Dscription like '%:8%' and d.PQTReqDate between :5 and :6 and d.TargetType=:14 :3 :7 :9 :10 :11 order by :13 d.PQTReqDate asc, d.DocEntry, d.LineNum

Text.val: Stock Entry pilih PR Production hanya bisa 1

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,35}) OR Trim({0,35})='', '', ' and h.ProjectHeader = ' & ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,35})&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,42}) OR Trim({0,42})='', '', ' and p.[Name] like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,42})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,43}) OR Trim({0,43})='', '', ' and ( ' & IF(Trim({0,47}) <> 'I', '', ' d.LineVendor is null or d.LineVendor = '''' or ') & ' d.LineVendor = '&ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,43})&ASCIIChr(39)&')')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select d.DocEntry, d.LineNum, H.DocNum, h.ObjType, h.BPLId, h.DocStatus, d.LineStatus, h.Requester, h.ReqName, p.Name as DeptName, h.DocDate, d.PQTReqDate as RequiredDate, d.LineVendor, c.CardName, h.ProjectHeader as Project, isnull(d.Project,'') as Activity, d.OpenQty as Quantity, (d.OpenQty * d.Price) as LineTotal, h.DocCur, h.Comments, d.ItemCode, d.Dscription as ItemName from prq1 d join ( select IIF(Project IS NULL OR Project = '', ':12', Project) as ProjectHeader, * from oprq h1 ) h on d.docentry = h.docentry left join OUDP p on h.Department = p.code left join ocrd c on d.LineVendor = c.CardCode where h.DocStatus = 'O' and d.LineStatus = 'O' and h.CANCELED <> 'Y' and h.DocNum like '%:1%' and h.DocType = :2 and h.ReqName like '%:4%' and d.Dscription like '%:8%' and d.PQTReqDate between :5 and :6 :3 :7 :9 :10 :11 order by d.PQTReqDate asc, d.DocEntry, d.LineNum

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,35}) OR Trim({0,35})='', '', ' and h.ProjectHeader = ' & ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,35})&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,42}) OR Trim({0,42})='', '', ' and p.[Name] like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,42})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select d.DocEntry, d.LineNum, H.DocNum, h.ObjType, h.BPLId, h.DocStatus, d.LineStatus, h.Requester, h.ReqName, p.Name as DeptName, h.DocDate, d.PQTReqDate as RequiredDate, d.LineVendor, c.CardName, h.ProjectHeader as Project, isnull(d.Project,'') as Activity, d.OpenQty as Quantity, (d.OpenQty * d.Price) as LineTotal, h.DocCur, h.Comments, d.ItemCode, d.Dscription as ItemName from prq1 d join ( select IIF(Project IS NULL OR Project = '', ':12', Project) as ProjectHeader, * from oprq h1 ) h on d.docentry = h.docentry left join OUDP p on h.Department = p.code left join ocrd c on d.LineVendor = c.CardCode where h.DocStatus = 'O' and d.LineStatus = 'O' and h.CANCELED <> 'Y' and h.DocNum like '%:1%' and h.DocType = :2 and h.ReqName like '%:4%' and d.Dscription like '%:8%' and d.PQTReqDate between :5 and :6 :3 :7 :9 :10 :11 order by d.PQTReqDate asc, d.DocEntry, d.LineNum

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,35}) OR Trim({0,35})='', '', ' and h.ProjectHeader = ' & ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,35})&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,42}) OR Trim({0,42})='', '', ' and p.[Name] like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim({0,42})&'%'&ASCIIChr(39))
